body_html:
The pooling op source is in
pooling_ops_common.cc

and several similar files. Look in core/kernels/* for anything with "pooling" in the name.

In the future, this sort of question is better asked on StackOverflow. This forum is primarily for bug reports.
body_text:
The pooling op source is in
pooling_ops_common.cc
and several similar files.  Look in core/kernels/* for anything with "pooling" in the name.
In the future, this sort of question is better asked on StackOverflow.  This forum is primarily for bug reports.
body:
The pooling op source is in 
[pooling_ops_common.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/pooling_ops_common.cc)

and several similar files.  Look in core/kernels/* for anything with "pooling" in the name.

In the future, this sort of question is better asked on StackOverflow.  This forum is primarily for bug reports.
